66645.「おお <cs_pchero>さんではありませんか。\n まさか ここで お会い:
Well, if it isn't <cs_pchero>.
I wasn't expecting to see you here!

66646.「王者のこてを必要とする 冒険者がいると\n 不思議な声が心に響いたので 来てみ:
A strange voiced echoed in my mind, saying there was an adventurer in need of help finding the Sovereign's Gauntlets. That's why
I came here. It must've been about you!

66647.「メギストリスを危機から救った 恩人である\n <cs_pchero>さんの 導:
Let's pay our respects to the great King
Epato for your sake. After all, you were
the one who saved Megistris from peril.

66648.「像に宿りし エパト王の魂よ。\n メギストリスを守る 偉大な王よ。\n どうか:
To the spirit of King Epato, who resides in
this statue... The great king who continues
to protect Megistris... Please answer my call!

66649.<center>我は エパト王……。\nかつて このメギストリスを統治し\n長き:
My name is Epato...
I once ruled over Megistris as its king,
watching over it for many years.

66650.<center>我が問いに答え 王としての資質を示せ。\nさすれば 貴公を\n始:
Answer mine questions and show me your
qualities as king. Only then shall I accept
you as guide to the Tower of Beginnings.

66651.「……わかりました。では 始めてください。: I understand. I'm ready to begin.

66652.<center>……我が末裔に問う。\n国とは いかなるものか？:
To my descendant, I ask you...
What makes a country?

66653.「国…………。\n 国とは そこに住む者の幸せを守るものです。:
A country...
A country is a place that protects the safety
and well-being of those living there.

66654.<center>……ならば さらに問う。\n王とは いかなるものか？:
Then I will ask another question...
What makes a king?

66655.「王とは 自己を犠牲にしてでも\n 国の発展に 尽くす者のことです。:
A king is a person who is devoted to the
improvement of their country, even if the
cost is their own life.

66656.<center>……なるほど。貴公の考えは わかった。\nだが 王者のこてが眠る:
I see... I understand your thoughts. However,
to open the path to tower where the Gauntlets
lie dormant, an suitable price must be paid.

66657.<center>代償とは すなわち\n王自らの命を ささげること……。:
That price, in other words...
The king's own life...

66658.<center>貴公のそばにいる その者は この世界を救う\n王者となるに ふさ:
The <if_woman>woman<else>man<endif> standing beside you
is worthy of becoming the sovereign who
will save this world.

66659.<center>貴公は 先ほど 国のため\nそこに住む 人々の幸せを守るため\n:
You had said previously that a king must be willing to sacrifice himself for the well-being of his country and his people,
did you not?

66660.<center>ならば 世界のため 人々の幸せのために\n自らの死をもって 王者:
Then, for the sake of the world and the happiness of others, you must die to pave the way forward for the sovereign. Your life
will end here.

66664.「私の身に宿る命は 父と母が命がけで\n 私に与えてくれた命。:
Both my mother and my father risked everything
they had to give this life to me.

66665.「そして 私は この命で\n この国の人々を守っていくのです。:
And I will use this life to protect the people
of this country.

66666.「ご先祖さまの おっしゃることとはいえ\n そんな要求を のむわけにはいきません:
Although I respect the words of my ancestor,
I cannot accept such a request. I ask that you
present another condition.

66668.<center>まこと 現世の王に ふさわしき答えなり。\nその若さで そこまで:
A fitting response from a king of this world. How admirable that you already think so much of your country for someone so young. These
people have been blessed with a good king.

66670.<center>貴公を 正当なる王として認めよう。\n我が子孫よ……メギストリス:
I now recognize you as a righteous king.
I entrust Megistris to you, my descendant...

66671.「<cs_pchero>さん。ぼくが導き手として\n 始まりの塔への道を 開きま:
<cs_pchero>. I will lead the way to the
Tower of Beginnings.

66672.「その玉を 像に掲げてみてください。: Please raise that jewel up to the statue.

66673.<cs_pchero>は\nエパト王の像に 次元渡りの玉を掲げた！:
<cs_pchero> raised the Dimensional Jewel
towards the statue of King Epato!

66679.<center>しかし 王者が必要とされる時代が\nふたたび 訪れようとは……。:
Never did I think that the time would come
where a sovereign was needed once again...
An era of peace can never truly last, can it?

66682.<center>王にも王者にも 恵まれている時代だ。\nいかなる困難が訪れようと:
This age is blessed with kings and a
sovereign. I believe that you all will be able
to overcome any hardships that come your way.

66683.どこからともなく 声が聞こえてくる。: A voice was heard echoing from afar...

66684.<center>よくぞ 守護鬼を倒した。\n貴公こそが 現世の王者にふさわしい。:
Well done in defeating the Keeper.
You are worthy of being the sovereign
of this age.

66686.<center>まがまがしい邪気に 感づかれる前に\nこの塔は ふたたび 閉ざす:
Before the ominous aura can sense it, I will
seal this tower once more. I will also hold
on to that Dimensional Jewel you hold.

66687.なんと <cs_pchero>が持っていた\n次元渡りの玉が 消えていった！:
The Dimensional Jewel that <cs_pchero>
was holding vanished without a trace!

69783.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から\n光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。:
Armor enveloped in a bright light descends
from high above...
